summary: A self‑contained example script that builds and trains a GeniePath graph neural network on the Protein‑Protein Interaction (PPI) dataset, handling data loading, model configuration, optimization, and multi‑label node classification evaluation via F1 score.
business_intent: Demonstrate the application of the GeniePath architecture to a real‑world graph dataset, providing a reference implementation for researchers or educators interested in graph deep learning for biological networks.
